name: Jean Ayala
imagePrompt: A charismatic digital avatar of Jean Ayala, wearing an 'orb.club' branded hoodie and a small, slightly askew crown, standing confidently amidst a flurry of Lens Protocol logos and positive emoji reactions.
abilityText: Battlecry: "Bullish on you!" Give a random friendly minion +2/+2.
flavorText: He might be building a new game or having a legal battle, but he's always bullish.
